rule.name: currency_scale_billions_to20_no_symbol
rule.comment: 12bn punt -> dhá bhilliún déag punt

rule.comment: 12m punt -> dhá mhilliún déag punt

rule.name: currency_scale_no_symbol
rule.comment: 21m dollar -> fiche a haon milliún dollar

rule.comment: £14 billiún -> ceithre bhilliún déag punt

rule.name: currency_scale_millions_to20
rule.comment: £14 milliún -> ceithre mhilliún déag punt

rule.name: currency_scale
rule.comment: £21 milliún -> fiche a haon milliún punt

rule.name: currency_scale_billion_no_space_to20
rule.comment: £2bn -> dhá bhilliún punt

rule.name: currency_scale_million_no_space_to20
rule.comment: £2m -> dhá mhilliún punt

rule.comment: £12.3 mln -> dó dhéag ponc a trí milliún punt

rule.comment: £12.3mln -> dó dhéag ponc a trí milliún punt

rule.name: currency_scale_with_comma_no_space_reverse
rule.comment: 2.3mln $ -> dó ponc a trí milliún dollar

rule.name: big_currency_millions_cents_11to12

rule.name: currency_asdigits_1
rule.comment: The case where the post-comma digits of a currency-related expression are said as "asdigits". £1.3456 -> punt amháin ponc a trí a ceathair a cúig a sé

rule.name: currency_asdigits_2to6
rule.comment: The case where the post-comma digits of a currency-related expression are said as "asdigits". £2.3456 -> dhá phunt ponc a trí a ceathair a cúig a sé

rule.name: currency_asdigits_7to10
rule.comment: The case where the post-comma digits of a currency-related expression are said as "asdigits". £7.3456 -> dhá phunt ponc a trí a ceathair a cúig a sé

rule.name: currency_asdigits_11to16
rule.comment: The case where the post-comma digits of a currency-related expression are said as "asdigits". £11.3456 -> dhá phunt ponc a trí a ceathair a cúig a sé

rule.name: currency_asdigits_17to19
rule.comment: The case where the post-comma digits of a currency-related expression are said as "asdigits". £17.3456 -> dhá phunt ponc a trí a ceathair a cúig a sé

rule.name: currency_asdigits
rule.comment: The case where the post-comma digits of a currency-related expression are said as "asdigits". £21.3456 -> deich punt ponc a trí a ceathair a cúig a sé

rule.name: currency_last_pre
rule.comment: Last resort rule for single token currency (such as USD25.03) We leave the handling of the number for later. USD10 -> deich dollar na stát aontaithe

rule.name: currency_last_post0
rule.comment: Last resort rule for single token currency preced by curency sign (such as $ 25.03US) We leave the handling of the number for later. $10US -> deich dollar na stát aontaithe

rule.name: currency_last_post
rule.comment: Last resort rule for single token currency (such as 25.03USD) We leave the handling of the number for later. 10USD -> deich dollar na stát aontaithe

rule.name: currency_signs
rule.comment: Remove left over currency signs $US 10 -> deich dollar na stát aontaithe

rule.name: currency_signsb
rule.comment: Remove left over currency signs US$25.03 -> fiche a cúig ponc a náid a trí dollar na stát aontaithe

rule.name: currency_signs2
rule.comment: Remove left over currency signs $US -> dollar na stát aontaithe

rule.name: currency_signs2b
rule.comment: Remove left over currency signs US$ -> dollar na stát aontaithe
